item.description: Scotland's Munsey and Leask shine in T20 World Cup opener, defeating Italy in their first match at the tournament.

item.title: Hetmyer Heroics and Shepherd Hat-Trick Propel West Indies to Victory Over Scotland
item.description: Shimron Hetmyer shines with the bat while Romario Shepherd takes a hat-trick as West Indies secure a dominant win against Scotland.
